use.flag: Support NVIDIA® GPUs for the CUDA® backend. Compatible with Pascal or later models.
Support AMD GPUs for the ROCm™ backend. Compatible with GCN 5 or later.
Support NVIDIA® GPUs for the TensorRT™ backend. Compatible with Turing, Ampere, or later models.
Support CPUs or GPUs with the Vulkan® 1.3 backend. Compatible with Intel® GPUs or older GPU models for different vendors.
